position: Professional Staff Member for Women Veterans Policy

requirements: significant experience with issues impacting women veterans
experience in government (at any level) or advocacy
extremely organized
excellent oral and written communications skills
demonstrated ability to work on a team
track record of successfully delivering excellent work in short timeframes
